title: An Adaptive Stacked Denoising Auto-Encoder Architecture for Human Action Recognition
authors: DX Wu, W Pan, LD Xie, CX Huang - Applied Mechanics and  …
excerpt: Abstract In this paper, a stacked denoising auto-encoder architecture method with adaptive learning rate for action recognition based on skeleton features of human is presented. Firstly a Kinect is used for capturing the skeleton images and extracting skeleton features. Then  ...
